channel.title: Tutorial on Cooking Up Statistics
channel.description: Recent content in Tutorial on Cooking Up Statistics

item.title: Scraping the Web without Learning HTML
item.description: Last year was a whirlwind full of exciting opportunities to travel and share my dual passions of food and statistics. When I resolved to eat healthier, my inner quant couldn’t resist the opportunity of using data to better achieve this goal. Therefore, I applied unsupervised machine learning to ease meal prep by grouping together recipes that shared similar ingredients. My data came from ingredients used in dishes uploaded to allrecipes.
